name: Options_addOptionGroupTest
description: Unit tests for the addOptionGroup method in the Options class.

test_cases.name: testAddOptionGroupWithRequiredGroup
test_cases.description: Tests adding a required OptionGroup to the Options and verifies it is correctly set and retrievable.

test_cases.name: testAddOptionGroupWithNonRequiredGroup
test_cases.description: Tests adding a non-required OptionGroup to the Options and verifies it is correctly set and retrievable.

test_cases.name: testAddOptionGroupSetsOptionRequiredToFalse
test_cases.description: Tests that adding an OptionGroup to the Options sets the required status of its options to false.

test_cases.name: testAddOptionGroupAddsOptionsToShortOpts
test_cases.description: Tests that adding an OptionGroup to the Options correctly adds its options to the short options list.

test_cases.name: testAddOptionGroupAddsOptionsToLongOpts
test_cases.description: Tests that adding an OptionGroup to the Options correctly adds its options to the long options list.
